extension.news: - Home: Remove leftover handling for old "Alternative home hubs refresh" setting - Watchlist/Discover: Fix watchlisted items not appearing as watchlisted when visited via discover hubs - PlexServer: Store prefs "LibraryVideoPlayedThreshold", "LibraryVideoPlayedAtBehaviour" if the current server is owned (the current user is the owner) - Core/PlexServerManager: Store server prefs per server context, don't fail if server not owned; improve logging - Core: Get video played threshold from server (only when current user owns the server; stored when server owner user uses the server; cached; default: 90) - Core: Support plex markers as watched indicators - Core/Settings: Add should_show callback to BasicSetting to determine whether to show it or not - Core/Settings: Implement 'Video play completion behaviour' from Plex Server (default: "earliest between threshold percent and first credits marker") - Core/Settings: Only show "Video played threshold" and "Video play completion behaviour" if we didn't fetch those values from the Plex Server previously (fallback) - Player: Try using Plex Server settings for video played handling, if possible - Video/PlayableVideo: Implement "has_credit_markers" property to determine video played handling similar to Plex - Updater: Try finding correct commit reference for requested addon.xml version; download specific commit tree instead of the latest one, if possible
